description: An underwater island located 10,000 meters below sea level, protected by a massive double-layered bubble. Home to both fish-men and merfolk, it serves as a gateway to the New World and has a complex history with humans.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Arrive at Fish-Man Island
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny breaks through the protective bubble surrounding Fish-Man Island using Coup de Burst, officially bringing the Straw Hats to this legendary underwater location.
keyEvents.significance: The crew arrives at a location first mentioned over 300 episodes ago, marking a major milestone in their journey to the New World.

statusHistory.reason: The Straw Hats arrive and begin exploring the island

description: A beautiful area on Fish-Man Island where young mermaids live, specifically the girls' dormitory section. It's a peaceful, welcoming place filled with friendly merfolk who are curious about surface dwellers.

keyEvents.title: Arrival at Mermaid Cove
keyEvents.description: Camie guides Luffy, Sanji, Usopp, and Chopper to Mermaid Cove, where they meet numerous friendly mermaids including Ishilly.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces a key location that showcases the beauty and peaceful nature of mermaid society, contrasting with the hostile New Fish-Man Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Meeting the Mermaids
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats meet multiple mermaids at Mermaid Cove who warmly welcome them to Fish-Man Island.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the friendly mermaid community and provides world-building for Fish-Man Island society.

statusHistory.reason: Active location where the Straw Hats visit

description: Camie's residence on Fish-Man Island where she lives and works. She uses this apartment to shelter Luffy, Sanji, Usopp, and Chopper after they are separated from the crew upon entering Fish-Man Island.

keyEvents.title: Waking at Camie's Apartment
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Sanji, Usopp, and Chopper regain consciousness in Camie's apartment after being separated during the entry to Fish-Man Island.
keyEvents.significance: Provides a safe haven for the separated Straw Hats and shows Camie's hospitality.

keyEvents.title: Medaka Quintuplets Visit
keyEvents.description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets visit Camie's apartment to return the Straw Hats' dried clothes.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces friendly characters and establishes Camie's connections in the mermaid community.

statusHistory.reason: Location where events occur in this episode

description: A district on Fish-Man Island where the New Fish-Man Pirates are based. It's shown in shadow during Hody Jones's first appearance, suggesting a darker, more dangerous area of the island.

keyEvents.title: Hody Jones's Shadowed Introduction
keyEvents.description: Hammond reports to Hody Jones in the Fish-Man District, where the leader of the New Fish-Man Pirates resides in shadow.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the base of operations for the arc's antagonists and builds atmosphere for the darker elements of Fish-Man Island.

statusHistory.reason: Shown as the base for the New Fish-Man Pirates
